activities:
MoPub, Inc. provides advertising technology services that allow publishers of mobile applications and websites to show ads, and advertisers to reach audiences that may be interested in their products or services. MoPub receives and processes personal information relating to natural persons in the EU/EEA and Switzerland who are individual contacts of publishers, advertisers, suppliers, service providers and other corporate business partners of MoPub. This personal information is collected, held and processed for different purposes, which may include any of the following: for sales and marketing to businesses, effecting transactions with businesses, supplying services and/or products to such businesses, financial processing and management, supplier relationship management, and customer support and customer relationship management.

MoPub’s advertising technology services are designed to avoid collecting information that identifies end users personally, such as name, address, or email address. MoPub receives and processes information about the devices of end users of mobile applications and mobile sites that use MoPub’s services within the EU/EEA and Switzerland. MoPub uses this information for purposes of serving ads, ad reporting and conversions, frequency capping, fraud detection and prevention, interest-based advertising, geo-targeting, and providing and improving our services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online and offline customer data which may be manually processed
recoursemech: MoPub, Inc. will cooperate with JAMS in accordance with the JAMS International Mediation Rules.
